Jūsų gyvenimo aprašymas ir jame pateikti asmens duomenys bus tvarkomi vadovaujantis UAB "Marijampolės pieno konservai" darbuotojų asmens duomenų saugojimo politika.

darbas dinamiškas, nemonotoniškas, susidedantis iš keleto užduočių: darbas prie žuvies filetavimo linijų; pagamintos produkcijos pakavimas; kokybės kontrolė; švaros darbo vietoje užtikrinimas; žaliavų paruošimas ir jų apdorojimas.

Reikalingų žaliavų paruošimas pagal receptūrą; gaminių formavimas pagal nustatytus parametrus; produkcijos pakavimas ir dėžių lankstymas; gaminių dėliojimas į dėžes; tešlos paruošimas gamybos linijoms.

Ši pozicija skirta specialistui, gebančiam sujungti technologinį žinojimą, robotikos programavimą ir konduktorių projektavimą, siekiant efektyviai valdyti ir tobulinti automatizuotus  ir rankinius suvirinimo procesus. Užduotys ir atsakomybės: •    Programuoti suvirinimo robotus pagal technologinius reikalavimus. •    Projektuoti suvirinimo konduktorius – nuo idėjos iki gamybinio brėžinio. •    Dirbti su SolidWorks, RoboDK programomis. •    Derinti suvirinimo sprendimus su inžinerijos, gamybos ir kokybės komandomis. •    Testuoti naujas programas, paleisti gamybą ir optimizuoti ciklo laikus. •    Analizuoti defektus, teikti siūlymus kokybės gerinimui

Kurti ir tobulinti programinės įrangos sprendimus naudojant TypeScript • Plėtoti ir palaikyti Node.js backend sistemas • Dirbti su Next.js framework (privalumas) • Įgyvendinti objektų orientuotus projektavimo modelius realiuose projektuose • Dirbti su reliacinėmis duomenų bazėmis, naudojant MS SQL • Bendradarbiauti su komanda diegiant efektyvius, patikimus ir keičiamus sprendimus

-Žiniatinklio programos kurimas naudojant Symfony ir API Platform; -Mentoriavimas kitiems programinės įrangos inžinieriams; -Vadovauti įvairiems naujiems projektams; -Priimti architektūrinius sprendimus.

Atsakomybės: * Kurti ir prižiūrėti IT sprendimų architektūrą, atsižvelgiant į našumo, saugumo ir keičiamumo reikalavimus. * Projektuoti ir integruoti sistemas, skirtas medicininių 3D duomenų peržiūrai, analizei ir personalizuotų gaminių projektavimui. * Konsoliduoti skirtingų sričių komponentus: 3D vizualizaciją (WebGL / Three.js), medicininių vaizdų analizę (pvz., DICOM), duomenų bazes ir UI sąsajas. * Vadovauti architektūrinių sprendimų priėmimui ir jų įgyvendinimo priežiūrai (pvz., SOA, Microservices), dokumentuoti architektūrą, užtikrinti jos testavimą ir palaikymą. * Bendradarbiauti su IT analitikais, ML/AI inžinieriais, 3D ir backend/front-end programuotojais, projektų vadovais ir šeimininkais. * Esant poreikiui, prisidėti prie architektūrinių sprendimų įgyvendinimo – atlikti sudėtingesnius programavimo darbus (backend ar frontend), padėti spręsti techninius iššūkius bei užtikrinti architektūros atitikimą praktikoje. * Aktyviai dalyvauti sprendimų analizės, projektavimo ir vystymo etapuose, siūlyti patobulinimus ir naujoves. * Užtikrinti efektyvų resursų panaudojimą bei sistemų testavimą (funkciniai, apkrovos testai).

IT infrastruktūros (serverių, duomenų saugyklų, tinklų, darbo vietų) parinkimas, diegimas, plėtra bei palaikymas; Įmonės IT sistemų ir duomenų saugos užtikrinimas, kibernetinių grėsmių analizė, Cybersecurity taikymas, ugniasienės ir DMZ priežiūra, duomenų archyvavimo ir atstatymo užtikrinimas; Kompiuterinių programų ir sistemų (ERP, GIT ir kitų) pirkimas, licencijų ir vartotojų teisių priežiūra, diegimas bei palaikymas; Svetainės, domeno ir SSL sertifikatų valdymas; IT paslaugų parinkimas, konkursavimas, priežiūra; Infrastruktūros ir programinės įrangos procedūrų rengimas bei tvarkymas, įmonės darbuotojų konsultavimas ir pagalba IT klausimais. Reikalavimai darbuotojui: 2 metų IT sistemų administratoriaus ar tinklų inžinieriaus darbo patirtis; Gebėjimas dirbti su Windows server (Active Directory, MS SQL, VMWare), Linux server (MYSQL, Apache); Tinklo protokolų, duomenų srautų, tinklo jungčių, įrangos (ugniasienių, maršrutizatorių, WiFi API) konfigūravimo išmanymas; Patirtis su archyvavimo sprendimais (Veeam); Kibernetinių incidentų valdymo, aptikimo ir analizės patirtis; Gebėjimas dirbti savarankiškai, analitinis mąstymas, iniciatyvumas ir atsakomybė.

job_title: Robot vacuum and lawn mower service technician
full_description: Mes siekiame, kad klientų įrenginiai būtų sutaisyti greitai ir kokybiškai. Labai vertiname atsakomybę bei komandinius sprendimus. job_title: Village elder, water management service master
full_description: Kaimų sen. meistras aptarnauja ir prižiūri Plungės r. kaimų seniūnijų vandentvarkos įrengimus, vandens tiekimo ir nuotekų šalinimo vamzdynus. Vadovauja brigados darbui remontuojant nuotekų ir vandentiekio vamzdynus esančius kaimų tarnybai priklausančiose teritorijose. Užtikrina kaimų sen. vandentvarkos įrenginių nepertraukiamą darbo režimą. Organizuoja teisingą pirminių dokumentų įforminimą, kontroliuoja materialinių vertybių panaudojimą. Tarnyboje organizuoja ir vykdo saugos darbe norminių aktų reikalavimus. Atostogų ar ligos metu pavaduoja tarnybos vadovą. Vairuoja ir prižiūri jo tarnybinį automobilį.

- Detaliai aprašyti reikalingas medžiagas: medieną, furnitūrą, apdailos medžiagas, tvirtinimo detales ir kt. - Bendradarbiauti su konstruktoriais, tiekimo ir/ar gamybos komandomis siekiant užtikrinti tikslumą. - Užtikrinti duomenų suvedimą ir palaikyti duomenų tikslumą.

Projektuosite įrankius, tvirtinimo įtaisus ir fiksatorius,kurie naudojami gamybos procese. Užtikrinsite jų efektyvumą, funkcionalumą ir atitiktį saugos standartų reikalavimams. Teiksite inžinerinę pagalbą projektuojant ir kuriant naujus ir esamus gaminius, procesus, įrangą, užtikrindami kokybę. Teiksite paramą sprendžiant problemas, susijusias su gamybos nuolatinio tobulinimo veikla ir neatitikimais.

Autokrautuvo vairavimas gamybos patalpose ir lauke; Iškrauti iš vilkiko gautą žaliavą; Pakrauti į vilkiką pagamintą produkciją (didmaišiais); Sandėliuoti ir prižiūrėti žaliavą pagal nustatytus reikalavimus; Susitvarkyti darbo vietoje; Kiti vadovo nurodyti darbai.

„VILVI Group“ ieško komandos pastiprinimo ir kviečia prisijungti gamybos darbuotojus! Darbas vakuumavimo ceche: Sūrių pakavimas, vakuumavimas; Darbo vietos, įrangos ir įrankių plovimas bei dezinfekcija; Laikymasis higienos, darbo saugos ir kokybės reikalavimų.

job_title: Raw Materials Quality Controller in Marijampolė
full_description: •    Gautų žaliavų ir medžiagų kokybės tikrinimas, vertinant jų tinkamumą ir atitikimą reikalavimams; •    Kokybės patikros ataskaitų rengimas; •    Broko nustatymas ir fiksavimas pagal nustatytą tvarką; •    Komunikacija su tiekėjais dėl kokybės neatitikčių; •    Bendradarbiavimas su kitų skyrių komandomis; •    Kitų vadovo paskirtų užduočių atlikimas.

Ar turi akylą žvilgsnį ir domiesi kokybės užtikrinimu? Ieškai darbo, kuriame tavo atsakomybė ir pastabumas iš tiesų svarbūs? Tuomet laukiame tavęs savo komandoje! Ką veiksi: Tikrinsi, ar įeinančios žaliavos atitinka kokybės standartus ir klientų lūkesčius; Fiksuosi duomenis ir valdysi neatitiktis; Seksi tiekėjų kokybės rodiklius; Prižiūrėsi, kad būtų laikomasi standartų ir techninių reikalavimų; Atsakysi už pavyzdžių ir etalonų valdymą. Kokybė prasideda nuo tavęs. Tapk mūsų komandos dalimi!

Darbas rengiant ir įgyvendinant tarptautinius tvarumo inovacijų projektus. Pagrindinės kryptys: klimatas, energetika, tvarumas, finansai/ investicijos, skaitmenizavimas dirbant su tarptautinėmis finansų, gamybos ir aukštųjų technologijų sektorių įmonėmis. Darbo pobūdis apima projektinių veiklų vykdymą, dokumentacijos rengimą, įskaitant veiklas skirtas bendradarbiavimo su tarptautiniais partneriais vystymui ir inovatyvių tvarumo sprendimų diegimą. Darbas dalinai gali būti atliekamas nuotoliniu būdu derinant su kita veikla.

Sistemų montavimo darbų organizavimo priežiūra (vadovavimas projektuotojų, inžinierių ir montuotojų komandai); Projektų biudžeto kontrolė ir premijos už pasiektus rezultatus; Betarpiškas bendravimas su Klientais, kilusių techninių, inžinerinių bei etinių problemų sprendimas; Efektyvių sprendimų paieška bendraujant su objektų darbų vadovais; Objekto pridavimo užsakovams organizavimas.

-Komunikacija su klientais, poreikių analizė; -Užsakymų koordinavimas (nuo užklausos gavimo iki pristatymo klientui); -Biudžeto valdymas; -Komercinių pasiūlymų rengimas; -Dizaino ir techninių sprendimų derinimas; -Projekto terminų užtikrinimas; -Rinkos analizė ir inovacijų taikymas; -Bendradarbiavimas su komanda. Aleksoto sen.

• Inžinerinių tinklų (vandentiekio, paviršinių ir buitinių nuotekų, šilumos tiekimo) statybos darbų planavimas ir priežiūra • Betranšėjų statybos ir renovacijos darbų organizavimas ir priežiūra • Reikalingos dokumentacijos rengimas ir tvarkymas • Medžiagų tiekimo organizavimas • Vadovavimas darbuotojų komandai, darbų paskirstymas, darbuotojų darbo laiko apskaitos vedimas • Darbų saugos, priešgaisrinės saugos, aplinkos apsaugos objekte užtikrinimas • Techninių klausimų derinimas su užsakovų atstovais • Bendravimas su subrangovais ir jų darbų atlikimo kontrolė • Darbų pridavimas užsakovams

Statinių techninės priežiūros darbai: metinių ataskaitų ruošimas; statinių nuolatiniai stebėjimai ir užfiksuotų trūkumų registravimas; statinio techninės apžiūros žurnalo pildymas; statybos sąmatų darymas; remonto darbų organizavimas.

pastatų inžinerinių sistemų: šildymo, santechnikos, vėdinimo (privalumas), kondicionavimo (privalumas) eksploatacijos ir remonto darbų organizavimas, vykdymo kontrolė; darbuotojų komandos (iki 6 darbuotojų) darbų organizavimas, valdymas; medžiagų, darbo žiniaraščio poreikių skaičiavimas; atliktų darbų aktų pridavimas užsakovui;

- Pastatų inžinerinių sistemų: šildymo, santechnikos, vėdinimo (privalumas), kondicionavimo eksploatacijos ir remonto darbų organizavimas, vykdymo kontrolė; - Darbuotojų komandos (iki 6 darbuotojų) darbų organizavimas, valdymas; -Medžiagų, darbo žiniaraščio poreikių skaičiavimas; - Atliktų darbų aktų pridavimas užsakovui. Objektai Kauno regiono

-Statybos darbų planavimas ir organizavimas objekte, laikantis nustatytų terminų (tiltų statyba); -Darbų atitikimo techniniams brėžiniams, projektui ir techninėms sąlygoms užtikrinimas; -Atliekamų darbų kokybės kontrolė visuose statybos etapuose; -Vadovavimas komandai, darbų koordinavimas, įgyvendinimo priežiūra; -Techninės dokumentacijos ruošimas; -Numatyto biudžeto išlaidų kontrolė. Darbo objektai - Kauno, Vilniaus ir vidurio Lietuvos regionuose.

Zakres obowiązków: sporządzanie wycen/kosztorysów robót elektrycznych kontrolowanie wykonania robót i usług w zakresie zgodności z dokumentacją techniczną (tj. schematami, rysunkami, innymi specyfikacjami lub warunkami umowy); bieżąca analiza techniczno-ekonomiczna realizowanego kontraktu, optymalizacja zastosowanych lub proponowanie nowych/innowacyjnych rozwiązań technicznych, jakościowych oraz organizacyjnych; nadzorowanie podległego zespołu pracowników i/lub podwykonawców w zakresie stosowania bezpiecznych metod pracy oraz realizacji usługi zgodnie z wymaganiami kontraktu; prowadzenie przynależnej dokumentacji Wymagania: - wykształcenie: wyższe (w tym licencjat) - konieczne - umiejętności: obsługa komputera - pakiet programów office - konieczne; Wysoka kultura osobista oraz rozwinięte umiejętności komunikacji i współpracy - konieczne; doświadczenie w pracy w zespole - konieczne - pozostałe: [Umiejętność 2] : umiejętność czytania rysunku technicznego, pracy z dokumentacją techniczną, doświadczenie zawodowe przy wycenianiu/kosztorysowaniu robót elektrycznych [Umiejętność 1] : umiejętność pracy w programach do kosztorysowania, bardzo dobra organizacja pracy, dokładność, samodzielność. [Inne] : Dopuszczamy również kandydatów z wykształceniem średnim branżowym z możliwością podjęcia dalszego kształcenia kierunkowego. <>Professionals
Commissioning Technician (m/f/d) - Poland

KHS is a subsidiary of Salzgitter AG. As one of the world's leading manufacturers of filling and packaging systems for beverages and liquid food we are a world-class player. Our customers have trusted in our passionate pioneering spirit and first-class technologies for over 150 years. However, we can only remain world class if we continue to find new employees who make just as high demands of themselves and the quality of their work as our customers make of us at KHS. Are you one of them?

Location: Warsaw

Your responsibilities:

- I/O (Input/ Output) check incl. Software, cable connections and safety equipment (STEP 7, Tia Portal)
- Checking of electrical safety list
- Reprogramming & amending the machine function & mechanical setting
- Optimization of machine parameters and ramp-up of equipment
- Documentation of changes made in hardware and software (save last version in ECM)
- Carry out site acceptance test (SAT)
- Complex troubleshooting
- Root cause analysis
- Daily documentation of work carried out
- Hands-on training of operators and maintenance staff

Your profile:

- Completed technical education
- Fluent English or German required; Polish is an advantage
- Efficient time management and flexible work scheduling depending on project requirements
- Willingness to travel
- Willingness to learn
- Solution-orientated thinking
- Work visa/permit to work in EU

Benefits:

- Innovative and international working environment
- Challenging and diversified job
- Working in a highly motivated team
- Strong company group
- Attractive remuneration
- Social benefits

In order to ensure our success in the future, too, we need first-class employees – and we also have plenty to offer them.

Apply now!

Contact person:

MZ Europe

Stephanie Punzo

KHS GmbH

Phone: +496718522963

DRIVEN BY PERFORMANCE?We are looking for motivated team players who want to help us drive the success of our company even further. We combine the experience of an internationally operating enterprise with the spirit and agility of an innovative start-up. Development and logistics are your passion? You enjoy working with ABAP and love continuously improving your skills? Then bring your enthusiasm and join us – fully remote from anywhere in Europe or at one of our office locations. Sounds exciting? Take the next step and send us your application! Become part of our team and actively shape the future of logistics with us!YOURE PLACE IN SUCESS • You will develop modern UI5 dialogs in the backend • The integration of material flow systems into SAP EWM is part of your responsibilities • Connecting automation technology and processes in the warehouse and logistics environment is also part of your role • You implement BADIs to flexibly adapt and extend SAP standard functions • You actively support the team during migrations and system changes • Technical error analysis and debugging are part of your daily work • You carefully document your developments and processes • In addition, you implement interfaces to third-party systems (SAP and non-SAP systems) WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR • You have at least 3 years of professional experience in this field • You have strong ABAP programming skills, including ABAP OO • Ideally, you have knowledge of the SAP EWM module • Experience in logistics-related projects is a plus • You show a strong willingness to learn and are eager to continuously develop your technical skills • Clear and effective communication within the team and with project stakeholders comes naturally to you • You speak English fluently, ideally • Knowledge of German is a plus • You have completed vocational training in computer science with a focus on application development or hold a related degree Benefits • A fair salary – overtime is flexibly compensated with either time off or financial reward • A hybrid work model with flexible hours and the option to work fully from home • Full control over your annual leave (30–90 days) and exciting workation opportunities • Pleasant business trips that are enjoyable, not stressful • Comprehensive onboarding and enablement: introduction days, a buddy system, and structured onboarding plans ensure you succeed from day one • Learning and development that truly advances your career: access a wide range of professional and personal seminars through our SWAN Academy • Clear career perspectives with regular feedback and development discussions to support your growth • Approachable leadership, a transparent corporate culture, and plenty of company events – from summer and Christmas parties to site events, team activities, breakfast talks, and one-on-one sessions with management SalaryAt SWAN, we place great value on fair and appropriate compensation for our employees. We understand that each individual brings unique qualifications and experiences that are valuable to our company. That’s why our salary offers are based on a careful assessment of your education, professional experience, as well as your personal and family circumstances. We strive to create an environment where our employees feel valued and recognized—not only through our corporate culture but also through our compensation policy. During the interview, we will discuss career paths and salary bands with you, and work together to determine an individualized placement that reflects your skills and experience within our compensation structure. Get in TouchApply directly through our online career portal: www.swan.de/karriere or send your complete application documents via email to: karriere@swan.de . If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us. Montae Clarke E-Mail: karriere@swan.de We look forward to hearing from you! About us SWAN - we live performance As a modern company, SWAN GmbH stands for the digital transformation in SAP logistics. At its locations in Augsburg, Altenstadt an der Waldnaab, Dortmund, Giebelstadt, Graz, Nuremberg, Wächtersbach and Walldorf, SWAN experts implement manual and automated logistics solutions based on the SAP modules SAP EWM and SAP TM. The focus is on innovative SAP logistics solutions, control of automated systems, technical interfaces as well as service and support. In addition, SWAN offers many add-ons in the areas of material flow, direct coupling and IoT connection, Real Time Location System (RTLS) and SAPUI5 usability at all workstations. The customer base includes companies from medium-sized businesses as well as international corporations. Successfully implemented projects from the food & beverage, automotive, chemical, pharmaceutical, retail, high-tech and electronics sectors are testimony to SWAN's expertise, both in the environment of highly automated distribution warehouses and in production integration and transport scheduling. Uncomplicated and flexible, SWAN founded 10 years ago, provides its more than 120 employees with an optimal working environment for experts and promotes self-responsible work according to the agile "New-Way-of-Working" principle. It lives openness, is characterized by flat hierarchies, stands for team spirit, cohesion and innovative spirit. Short decision-making processes, flexible work arrangements and a balanced degree of personal responsibility, coupled with open communication and creative cooperation - these are important ingredients in SWAN GmbH's recipe for success.

Experience integrating SAP HCM with Azure Databricks. Strong communication skills in English and a relevant bachelor’s degree or equivalent.

Magst du es, deine digitale Expertise einzusetzen, um Effizienz und Mitarbeitererfahrung zu verbessern? Werde Teil von Vestas als ServiceNow Solution Designer und gestalte skalierbare Lösungen mit, die unsere globale Belegschaft und unsere Mission für erneuerbare Energien unterstützen. Digital Solutions & Development > Digital Solutions > Service Management Die Nachfrage nach dem Enterprise Service Management Produktteam in Digital Solutions wächst, und das Team aus professionellen, leidenschaftlichen und kompetenten Kolleg:innen in den Philippinen und Dänemark braucht dich.  Das Team entwirft, entwickelt und liefert Enterprise Service Management Lösungen, die von allen über 30.000 Vestas-Mitarbeitenden genutzt werden. Die Lösungen decken zahlreiche Geschäftsbereiche im Unternehmen ab und ermöglichen eine effiziente Orchestrierung und Arbeitsabläufe über die ServiceNow-Plattformtechnologie.  Das Design aller Lösungen orientiert sich an den Bedürfnissen der Menschen, die sie nutzen, sowie an den strategischen Zielen und Prioritäten von Vestas. Verantwortlichkeiten In dieser Position übernimmst du eine Auswahl oder Kombination von: - Entwurf und Bereitstellung von End-to-End-Lösungen auf der ServiceNow-Plattform zur Optimierung von Effizienz und Mitarbeitererfahrung, zur Straffung von Geschäftsprozessen und zur Sicherstellung nahtloser Systemintegration - Zusammenarbeit mit Stakeholdern zur Erstellung visuell intuitiver und benutzerfreundlicher Lösungen, die die kognitive Belastung minimieren und mit den Geschäftszielen übereinstimmen. Operationalisiert durch Engagement zur Erfassung von Praktiken und Anforderungen, Übersetzung in Features, User Stories und technische Aufgaben - Management mehrerer Projekte und Stakeholder mit unterschiedlichen Hintergründen, Rollen und Fähigkeiten bei gleichzeitiger Unterstützung von Design, Entwicklung, Test und Bereitstellung von Service Management Lösungen auf der ServiceNow-Plattform - Beitrag zur Festlegung von Best Practices und Governance für Entwicklung und Konfiguration auf der ServiceNow-Plattform, Vermeidung technischer Schulden, Sicherstellung einer skalierbaren und gesunden Plattform sowie Innovation mit Low-Code/No-Code-Lösungen - Mitgestaltung von Strategien zur Bereitstellung von Enterprise Service Management Lösungen - Erstellung von Schulungsinhalten und Förderung der Akzeptanz zur Erzielung von Geschäftswert bei Vestas - Arbeit in einem agilen und kollaborativen Entwicklungsumfeld, ermöglicht durch Transparenz und aktive Teilnahme an Scrum-Praktiken Qualifikationen - Abschluss in Informatik, MIS oder einem verwandten Bereich mit über 2 Jahren Erfahrung im Service Management auf der ServiceNow-Plattform - Praktische Erfahrung mit mindestens drei der folgenden: ITSM Pro, Integration Hub, HR Service Delivery Pro, Workplace Service Delivery, SecOps, App Engine, Employee Center, Next Experience, OTSM oder ServiceNow GenAI - Fundiertes Verständnis von Lösungsarchitektur, Service Management Konzepten und Plattformlebenszyklus - Nachgewiesene Erfahrung in der Durchführung von Workshops und der Übersetzung von Geschäftsanforderungen in Lösungsdesigns - Kompetent in Stakeholder-Kommunikation und bereichsübergreifender Zusammenarbeit - Erfahrung in Projektkoordination oder agiler Lieferung - Fließend in Englisch mit effektiven mündlichen und schriftlichen Kommunikationsfähigkeiten Kompetenzen Als Person: - Hast du Interesse daran, Geschäftsprozesse und -praktiken zu erforschen, um ein tieferes Verständnis dafür zu gewinnen, wie Systeme im organisatorischen Kontext funktionieren, und Erfahrung im Design von Nutzerreisen - Bist du von Natur aus professionell und engagiert mit einem ausgeprägten Qualitätsbewusstsein und berücksichtigst kontinuierliche Serviceverbesserung und Optimierung in allem, was du tust - Bist du flexibel mit einer Can-Do-Einstellung und einem innovativen Mindset und gedeihst in einem spannenden Umfeld mit fortschrittlichen Menschen - Bist du selbstmotiviert – du handelst eigenständig. Wenn du bei der Implementierung einer Lösung Probleme siehst, sorgst du dafür, dass diese für zukünftige Priorisierungen notiert werden - Bist du mit agilen Arbeitsweisen vertraut und trägst aktiv zu einem kollaborativen Entwicklungsumfeld bei - Schätzt du Einfachheit und Klarheit in deinen Lösungen, mit dem Ziel, Komplexität zu reduzieren und intuitive Nutzererlebnisse zu liefern - Schätzt du den Aufbau von Beziehungen und die enge Zusammenarbeit mit anderen, um ein gemeinsames Verständnis und eine Ausrichtung zu schaffen Was wir bieten Arbeit in einem dynamischen und innovativen Umfeld, in dem du die Zukunft der digitalen Zusammenarbeit und Arbeitsplatzlösungen bei Vestas mitgestalten kannst. Möglichkeiten zur beruflichen Weiterentwicklung mit Zugang zu Schulungs- und Entwicklungsprogrammen.  Teil einer kollaborativen Kultur sein, die Teamarbeit und Wissensaustausch wertschätzt und nach den Vestas-Werten arbeitet: Einfachheit, Zusammenarbeit, Verantwortung und Leidenschaft. Zusätzliche Informationen Die Position kann an unseren Standorten in Aarhus oder Kopenhagen (Dänemark), Warschau oder Stettin (Polen), Hamburg (Deutschland), Porto (Portugal), Manila (Philippinen) oder Chennai (Indien) angesiedelt sein. Bitte beachte, dass für diese Position keine Unterstützung bei der Umsiedlung angeboten wird. Wir ermutigen daher Bewerber:innen, die bereits in der Nähe eines der genannten Standorte wohnen. Wir behalten uns das Recht vor, diese Stellenausschreibung jederzeit zu ändern oder zurückzuziehen, auch vor dem angegebenen Bewerbungsschluss. Wir empfehlen dir, dich bis zum 22.07.2025 zu bewerben.

Warunki pracy: 1) Wymiar czasu pracy: 1 etat; 2) Miejsce pracy  Mikołów, ul. Żwirki i Wigury 4a  trzykondygnacyjny budynek biurowy z windą  siedziba urzędu Starostwa Powiatowego; Miejsce pracy jest wyposażone w zaplecze socjalne, kadrowe i techniczne; 3) Charakter pracy: Praca jednozmianowa w wieloosobowym pomieszczeniu biurowym ze stanowiskiem komputerowym, wymagająca wysokiego stopnia samodzielności i kreatywności oraz umiejętności zarządzania czasem, stały kontakt z klientem wewnętrznym i zewnętrznym Starostwa. Bei Accelleron kommst du weiter! Aufbauend auf der Erfolgsgeschichte von mehr als 100 Jahren ABB Turbocharging wirst du Teil eines Teams echter Expertinnen und Experten in einem spannenden internationalen Umfeld, die sich gemeinsam für Spitzenleistungen einsetzen. Als vertrauenswürdiger Partner unterstützen wir unsere Kundinnen und Kunden beim Übergang zu nachhaltigen Industrien mit innovativer Technologie, Expertise und intelligenten Lösungen. Wir fördern Vielfalt und Inklusion in allen Dimensionen (z. B. Geschlecht, LGBTQ+, ethnische Zugehörigkeit, Alter, Beeinträchtigung, Religion oder andere Merkmale), da wir individuelle Unterschiede begrüssen und feiern. Sie haben Freude an der Umsetzung von Projekten in einem modernen Produktionsumfeld? Dabei handelt es sich um Verbesserungsprojekte mittlerer Komplexität. Sie sind dabei zuständig für die Planung, Umsetzung bis hin zum erfolgreichen Projektabschluss. Sie haben Erfahrung im Bereich Lean Management / Lean Six Sigma und haben die Fähigkeit dieses Wissen entsprechend zu vermitteln? Ihr Profil ergänzt sich mit Skills wie Teamfähigkeit, analytisches Denken & Handeln, hohe Eigenmotivation resp. -Initiative, Durchsetzungsvermögen und durch eine strukturierte Arbeitsweise? Dann sind Sie die richtige Ergänzung für unser Team. Ihre Aufgaben: Umsetzen von Verbesserungsprojekten mittlerer Komplexität Umsetzen von Digitalisierungsprojekten Mitarbeit in divisionsübergreifenden Projekten Vermitteln von Wissen zu Lean Management / Lean Six Sigma Anwenden der gängigen Lean Tools wie 5S, KVP, PDCA, SMED usw. Ansprechpartner in der Division für Teilemarkierungen Aneignen von tiefer Prozesskenntnissen E2E im Bereich Serialisierung und Teilemarkierung samt damit involvierter Systeme Selbstständiges Verbessern, Anpassen und Vereinfachen der mit Serialisierung im Zusammenhang stehenden Prozessen Divisionsvertreter in unserem Warehousing Transformations-Projekt (Einführung SAP EWM) Ihre Anforderungen: Abgeschlossene Berufslehre und Weiterbildung auf Stufe HF, Abschluss Bachelor resp. Master in FH oder Universität Erfahrung in der Umsetzung von mittelgrossen Projekten Erfahrung in SAP EWM Ausgewiesener Projekterfolg in einem Digitalisierungsprojekt Erfahrung in einem industriellen Umfeld Wissen vorhanden im Bereich Lean Management / Lean Six Sigma Affinität in IT-Themen und Datenanalyse Sehr gute Deutsch-Kenntnisse in Wort und Schrift, Englisch-Kenntnisse von Vorteil Logistische Prozessexpertise und Erfahrung mit SAP EWM sind von Vorteil Sehr gute Kommunikations- und Organisationsfähigkeiten Teamfähigkeit Begeisterungsfähigkeit Ihre Benefits: Kantine Attraktive Urlaubspläne Mitarbeiterunterstützungsprogramm Flexible Arbeitszeiten und -modelle Wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung (gerne auf Englisch). Wenn du mehr über Accelleron erfahren möchtest, besuche unsere Website accelleron.com . Datenschutzerklärung von Accelleron: accelleron.com/privacy-notice/candidate

company_name: UMICORE BATTERY MATERIALS POLAND Limited Liability Company
full_description: Zakres obowiązków: Jako technik laboratoryjny będziesz wspierać operacje analityczne naszego laboratorium w zakładzie, wykonując pomiary, konserwując sprzęt i zapewniając dokładność danych. Będziesz ściśle współpracować ze starszymi chemikami i innymi zespołami wewnętrznymi, aby utrzymać wysokie standardy jakości, bezpieczeństwa i zgodności. Niezależnie od tego, czy zaczynasz swoją karierę, czy masz już praktyczne doświadczenie, ta rola daje możliwość pogłębienia umiejętności technicznych w dynamicznym środowisku laboratoryjnym. Przeprowadzanie analizy fizykochemicznej próbek z produkcji seryjnej, stosując zalecane metody i zwracając uwagę na jakość wyników. Przygotowanie próbek do pomiarów analitycznych, w tym odbioru od zleceniodawcy, rejestracji w LIMS i archiwizacji . Wykonywanie pomiarów analitycznych zgodnie z zalecanymi metodami w wyznaczonym obszarze analitycznym i wprowadzanie danych do centralnej bazy danych LIMS. Ocena i porównanie wyników analiz, ocena, w oparciu o granice kontrolne. Przeprowadzenie testów MSA. Używanie sprzętu we właściwy i bezpieczny sposób w oparciu o dedykowaną dokumentację . Zapewnienie optymalnych działań wyznaczonego sprzętu laboratoryjnego poprzez wykonywanie okresowych planów konserwacji i odpowiedniego przeglądu.  Nadzór nad chemikaliami i materiałami odniesienia dla wyznaczonego obszaru analitycznego: Używanie chemikaliów we właściwy i bezpieczny sposób w oparciu o dedykowaną dokumentację (SDS, Instrukcje pracy). Usuwanie odpadów w bezpieczny sposób. Utrzymanie miejsca pracy w laboratorium w czystości i porządku (np. Zgodnie z 5S). Wymagania: - wykształcenie: wyższe (w tym licencjat) - konieczne - pozostałe: Wykształcenie średnie techniczne lub licencjackie z chemii lub pokrewnego kierunku, 1 rok doświadczenia pracy w laboratorium. Znajomość ISO9001, ISO17025 i pojęć takich jak niepewność pomiaru i identyfikowalność. Podstawowa znajomość sprzętu analitycznego (e.g. PSD, ICP, BET, XRD, SEM, KF, miareczkowanie) będzie dodatkowym atutem. Umiejętność ostrożnej, sumiennej

job_title: Manager TTE & Process Engineering (Engineer - Mechanical Engineering)
full_description: We’re looking for a dynamic leader to oversee our Tooling & Test Equipment (TTE) and Process Engineering teams. In this role, you’ll ensure our shops are equipped with reliable tooling, robust technical processes, and the support and documentation needed to operate at their best. Responsibilities and Tasks including but are not limited to the following: - Organizes, supervises and leads Engineering teams to provide capable TTE, technical processes and support. - Leads Engineering teams to provide capable TTE, technical processes, support and documentation. - Leads employee relations through clear communication and coaching. - Plans, executes and monitors TTE/process projects to meet time, budget and quality targets. - Ensures compliance with regulations, safety and environmental requirements. - Defines and optimizes targets and KPIs. - Assists in incident/deviation analysis and recommendations. - Contributes to LHT’s iMRO network. - Assists Director of Engineering on major projects. - Ensures employee qualifications and compliance with company policies. Ihr Profil: In this role, you will play a key part in leading our Engineering teams and ensuring the reliability and effectiveness of our tooling, processes and technical support. Success in this position requires strong leadership skills, technical expertise and a proactive approach to continuous improvement. - Minimum 5 years of professional experience - Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in mechanical or electrical engineering - Strong written and spoken Portuguese and English skills, German desirable - Professional experience in aircraft, engine, component engineering/maintenance, or material planning preferred - Strong computer skills (MS Office, SAP) - Good knowledge of logistics - High customer focus, service mindset - Excellent analytical, planning, flexibility, and decision-making skills - Ability to structure, schedule and plan complex work - Strong decision-making and sense of responsibility Please send your application in English. Candidates must have the right to live/work in Portugal. Applications will be evaluated based solely on the candidates' merit, without consideration of any other factors.

job_title: Engine Mechanic for Composite Parts (Engineer - Mechanical Engineering)
full_description: The mechanic in the composite division is responsible for the manual and technical repair of composite engine parts and accessories. They will be working with complex technical systems, ensuring high standards of safety and quality in every task. Responsibilities and Tasks including but are not limited to the following: - Inspection and repair of composite parts - Manual and technical repairs of composite materials (manual grinding, preparing surfaces, priming, painting using a roller or touch-up, heat treatment) - Apply manufacturer specifications and technical documentation - Structure, plan and schedule of complex work and technical processes. - Collaborate with team members to solve technical challenges and streamline workflows. - Quality control and documentation of work completed using relevant software. Ihr Profil: We’re looking for a motivated Composite Mechanic with the following skills: - Completed technical vocational training (metalworking or composite processing profession) desirable, but experience in the composite sector is not required. Career changers welcome. - Very good knowledge of English and Portuguese, both written and spoken - Ability to structure, schedule and plan complex work processes and technical issues. - Very good computer skills (MS Office, SAP, etc.) Together with your application, please provide documentation (if available) as follows: - Foreign certificate/diploma with curriculum - AML (if comparable to EASA/FAA/TCCA license) - Confirmation letters from former employers - Part 147 or OEM certificate or known maintenance organization certificate with curriculum Please send your application in English. Candidates must have the right to live/work in Portugal. Applications will be evaluated based solely on the candidates' merit, without consideration of any other factors.

O PERFIL DE COMPETÊNCIAS PRETENDIDO PARA A(S) VAGA(S) REÚNE OS SEGUINTES CRITÉRIOS: UTILIZAR MÉTODO CIENTÍFICO, TANTO PARA A SOLUÇÃO DOS PROBLEMAS TECNOLÓGICOS SEGUNDO OS PARADIGMAS VIGENTES DO CONHECIMENTO, COMO PARA A CONSTRUÇÃO DE UM NOVO PARADIGMA; CONHECER E APLICAR A PRÁTICA PROFISSIONAL VIGENTE NA REALIDADE SOCIAL ONDE EXERCERÁ SUA ATIVIDADE; CRIAR E UTILIZAR MODELOS PARA A CONCEÇÃO E ANÁLISE DE SISTEMAS, PRODUTOS E PROCESSOS; DOMINAR TÉCNICAS COMPUTACIONAIS E DE COMUNICAÇÃO ORAL E ESCRITA; DOMINAR O IDIOMA MATERNO E INGLÊS NA EXPOSIÇÃO ORAL E COMPREENSÃO E ESCRITA; TRABALHAR EM EQUIPA E INDIVIDUALMENTE; DESENVOLVER CAPACIDADE DE LIDERANÇA E ESPÍRITO EMPREENDEDOR NA RESOLUÇÃO DE PROBLEMAS FOCANDO-SE NA PROCURA ATIVA DE SOLUÇÕES; APLICAR NA PRÁTICA E EM CONTEXTO OFICINAL, OS CONHECIMENTOS INERENTES À ÁREA; POR FIM, MAS NÃO MENOS IMPORTANTE, É VALORIZADO O GOSTO PELA ÁREA, A MOTIVAÇÃO E A PREDISPOSIÇÃO PARA A AQUISIÇÃO DE NOVOS CONHECIMENTOS E COMPETÊNCIAS QUE VISEM O CRESCIMENTO PROFISSIONAL, BEM COMO, O DESENVOLVIMENTO DA EMPRESA. RELATIVAMENTE AO REGIME DO HORÁRIO LABORAL, O MESMO É SEMANAL (DE SEGUNDA A SEXTA-FEIRA) NO HORÁRIO DAS 9H00 À 13H00 E DAS 14H00 ÀS 18H00.

As funções incluem a manutenção preventiva e corretiva de veículos, o diagnóstico de falhas usando ferramentas e softwares específicos, a reparação e substituição de peças desgastadas ou danificadas e a realização de serviços como troca de óleo e alinhamento. The Mechatronic Technician for Aircraft Components is responsible for troubleshooting, inspecting, and repairing mechatronic and electronic aircraft components. They will be working with complex technical systems, ensuring high standards of safety and quality in every task. - Inspect, repair and troubleshoot mechatronic and electronic aircraft components; - Replacement of single electronic/mechanical component-parts within repair and troubleshooting tasks; - Perform necessary tests to ensure the proper function of the components in the aircraft system; - Structure, plan, and schedule complex work and technical processes; - Collaborate with team members to resolve technical challenges and optimize workflow; - Maintain documentation of work completed using relevant software. Ihr Profil: We are looking for a Technician with background in electronics or mechatronics to join our team working on aircraft components. - Very good written and spoken English and Portuguese skills; - Completed technical vocational training or a bachelor’s degree in Mechatronics or Electronics; - Very good knowledge and several years hands-on experience in troubleshooting, inspecting, and repairing mechatronic or electronic components (on aviation fields is an advantage); - Very good expertise in analogue, digital and measurement technology; - Ability to structure, schedule, and plan complex work processes and technical issues; - Very good computer skills (MS Office, SAP, etc.); - Experience in leading and guiding employees is an advantage. Please send your application in English. Candidates must have right to live/work in Portugal. Applications will be evaluated based solely on the candidates' merit, without consideration of any other factors.

job_title: Process Expert (f/m/d) Lead to Cash for Service & Governance Units (Business Economist (University))
full_description: Transform the everyday. Join our team as a Lead to Cash Process Expert (f/m/d) and play a key role in driving automation, digitalization, and harmonization across Siemens' finance and controlling processes. As part of our team, you will have: - An attractive remuneration package- Appealing Siemens pension benefits and access to employee share plans- 30 days of paid vacation and a variety of flexible work schedules that allow time off for you and your family- 2 to 3 days of mobile working per week as a global standard Since each of over 300,000 employees feels that other benefits are particularly important, and we cannot list our entire benefit portfolio here, you can find more information here ( https://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs/benefits-what-we-offer.html ) . The individual benefits are subject to regulatory, contractual, or corporate conditions. This will be your impact: - Process Design and Automation: As a process expert for the Lead-to-Cash process across SFS, SRE, and Service & Governance, you’ll analyze global and regional needs and ensure systems are aligned using harmonized templates for financial processes.- Business Requirements Evaluation: You’ll review business needs for order management, including customer communication, and design clear, efficient processes that meet both business and technical goals.- System Harmonization: You’ll align systems and templates with financial reporting rules and legal standards to ensure consistency and compliance.- Cross-Project Management: You’ll manage tasks that span multiple projects, including adapting guidelines and documenting changes to accounting instructions (AIFG).- Implementation and Development: You’ll lead process improvements from concept to go-live, creating solutions that work for both business and IT teams. You’ll also present current and future designs in your governance role.- Communication & Collaboration:- With Siemens corporate units (SFS, SRE, and Service & Governance) to align on future Lead-to-Cash process needs.- With Sherpa X project teams to ensure integrated and consistent solutions.- With contributors across the Sherpa X program.- With Siemens IT teams to support standard system delivery. This is how you'll win us over: - Education: Master’s degree in business studies or economics or alternatively comparable qualification has been reached- Experience & Skills:- Several years of professional experience, preferably in the field of finance related solutions, as well as experience with SAP S4- Expertise in Lead-to-Cash processes- Good understanding of SAP S/4HANA and other Finance related solutions in general- You have 3-5 years of hands on experience and expertise in SAP SD- Expertise in other technical components relevant for the Lead-to-Cash Process within Sherpa X (SAP BTP, SAP DRC, EDI) is a plus- Knowledge of agile project methodology, experience in a global environment, operational business experience as well as intercultural experience is key- Affinity for IT and are willing to familiarize yourself with IT structures is helpful - Ways of working: Experience in working within virtual and global teams and you are a standout colleague with excellent communication and interpersonal skills- Languages: Business proficiency in English You are much more than your qualifications, and we believe in the potential of every single candidate. We look forward to getting to know you!     Your individual personality and perspective are important to us. We create a working environment that reflects the diversity of the society and support you in your personal and professional development. Let’s get to know your authentic personality and create a better future together with us. As an equal-opportunity employer we are happy to consider applications from individuals with disabilities ( https://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs/life-at-siemens/inclusion.html ) . Protecting the environment, conserving our natural resources, fostering the health and performance of our people as well as safeguarding their working conditions are core to our social and business commitment at Siemens. About us. Our global, diverse team is ready to support, challenge, and inspire you, helping you grow in countless ways. Together, we’ll embark on an exciting journey of discovery. Who knows where this path will lead? Join us and take an active role in shaping your future! www.siemens.com/careers ( http://www.siemens.com/careers )  – if you would like to find out more about jobs & careers at Siemens. job_title: German Tech Support – Drone Enthusiast | Lisbon 🚁
full_description: Do you love tech, drones, and helping people? Join DJI, the world’s leading drone company, and be part of an exciting team that supports cutting-edge aerial technology!  As a German Customer Support Advisor, you’ll assist customers with everything from setup and troubleshooting to product recommendations and technical inquiries. What You’ll Do: Help customers with drone setup, troubleshooting, and product guidance  Respond to inquiries via phone and email with professionalism and enthusiasm  Diagnose technical issues related to drones, controllers, and software  Manage orders, returns, and exchanges  Stay up to date on the latest drone models and industry trends  Ensure customers have a smooth and enjoyable experience with their DJI products What We’re Looking For: • Fluent in German & English (written & spoken) • Passion for drones, tech, and customer service • Problem-solving mindset & strong communication skills • Ability to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment Perks & Benefits: • Monthly gross salary • Tech Bonus • Language Bonus • Loyalty Bonus • Rent Support: 400/month (for 12 months!) • Meal Allowance • Holiday & Christmas Bonuses: Extra salary payments • Medical & Dental Insurance (after 6 months) • Relocation Support: Flight (200) + Housing Assistance • Paid Training from Day 1 Ready to turn your passion for drones into a career? Apply today and join us in Lisbon!

Diploma em Engenharia Eletrotécnica ou Informática, experiência em software Visual Basic ou Phyton, conhecimentos de CAM, atitude proativa/boa motivação para aprender, capacidade de trabalhar sob pressão, disciplina de organização e metodologia, boa atenção ao detalhe.

Trabalhador pontual, com boa capacidade de comunicação, espírito de equipa em contexto pluridisciplinar e disponibilidade para deslocações fora do local de trabalho no Entroncamento. Capaz de proceder à elaboração de desenhos técnicos (plantas, cortes, esquemas, pormenores) e com bons conhecimentos de BIM em MEP, assim como em software de projeto.

RECEÇÃO DE ENCOMENDAS COM CONFERÊNCIA DE PRAZOS DE VALIDADE, QUANTIDADE E PREÇO. INTERPRETAÇÃO DE PRESCRIÇÕES MÉDICAS COM AVIAMENTO E ESCLARECIMENTO AO UTENTE SOBRE POSOLOGIA, ETC. RECOLHA DE STOCK COM FIM DE VALIDADE PARA DEVOLUÇÃO AO FORNECEDOR. ORGANIZAÇÃO DE LINEARES CONSOANTE MUDANÇA SAZONAL.

SOMOS UMA EMPRESA SITUADA EM ALMANCIL PME EXCELÊNCIA NA ÁREA DE INSTALAÇÕES ELÉTRICAS, ESTAMOS À PROCURA DE UM ENGENHEIRO INFORMÁTICO PARA INTEGRAR A NOSSA EQUIPA DE ENGENHARIA, PARA PROGRAMAÇÃO DE SISTEMA DE DOMÓTICA. ALGUNS REQUISITOS NECESSÁRIOS: FORMAÇÃO ACADÉMICA NA ÁREA DA ENGENHARIA INFORMÁTICA; CAPACIDADE PARA ACOMPANHAR OBRAS E ASSEGURAR A EXECUÇÃO DOS PROJETOS CONFORME OS PRAZOS E A QUALIDADE EXIGIDOS; BENEFÍCIOS: SALÁRIO COMPATÍVEL; AMBIENTE DE TRABALHO DINÂMICO.

job_title: ELECTROMECHANIC, ELECTRICIAN AND OTHER INSTALLERS OF MACHINES AND ELECTRICAL EQUIPMENT
full_description: Você será responsável por realizar trabalhos de campo relacionados à instalação, desinstalação e reinstalação do Stratio Databox, a nossa unidade de recolha de dados de veiculos, seguindo os processos definidos.Tarefas:Realizar trabalhos de campo ou suporte remoto para instalar a Solução de Hardware;Realizar trabalhos de campo ou suporte remoto para corrigir problemas na Solução de Hardware da Stratio que afetem o serviço;Ministrar formação para clientes e parceiros sobre o uso das soluções de hardware da Stratio;Reportar o progresso do trabalho ao supervisor e ao líder do projeto;Representar a Stratio de forma profissional diante do cliente;Criar manuais de instalação de acordo com os procedimentos internos;Criar cabos elétricos conforme os procedimentos internos.O que acreditamos ser necessário para esta função:Experiência na área elétrica, incluindo o uso de multímetros;Carta de condução categoria B;Total disponibilidade e flexibilidade para viagens nacionais e internacionais, espere estar na estrada entre 2 a 3 semanas por mês, longe de casa;Disponibilidade para trabalhar aos fins de semana e/ou em horários noturnos, quando necessário;Alto nível de autonomia e capacidade de trabalhar sob pressão;Usuário independente da língua inglesa;Fluência em português, espanhol ou francês.Pontos Bonus:Conhecimento no uso de Equipamentos de Diagnóstico;Conhecimento e compreensão de redes de comunicação veicular;Entendimento sobre OBD, UDS, FMS, ISO 15765, J1939, J1708, KWP2000 ou qualquer outro protocolo utilizado em redes de veículos;Experiência prévia em manutenção automotiva/elétrica.
PESSOA RESPONSAVEL PARA O APOIO TECNICO AOS ASSOCIADOS NA REALIZAÇÃO DE CANDIDATURAS, REALIZAÇÃO DE CADERNOS DE CAMPO E PEDIDOS DE APOIO. PESSOA MOTIVADA E COM VONTADE DE APRENDER.

As a Senior Tax Technology Expert (f/m/d) for the Digital Tax Eco-System, you will help shape the framework for digital transformation, especially in relation to the introduction of a global tax engine within the SAP S4 implementation for Siemens Group. What we offer you - An attractive remuneration package- Access to Siemens share plans- 30 days of paid vacation and a variety of flexible work schedules that allow time off for you and your family- 2 to 3 days of mobile working per week as a global standard- Flexible training opportunities for both your professional and personal development that you can tailor to your interests Since each of over 300,000 team members feels that other benefits are particularly important, and we cannot list our entire benefit portfolio here, you can find more information here ( https://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs/benefits-what-we-offer.html ) . The individual benefits are subject to regulatory, contractual, or corporate conditions. You’ll make an impact - You will be part of the project team responsible for rolling out a global tax engine across several projects. - Collaboration with Tax Governance, Siemens IT, and external partners will be a key part of your daily work to ensure a forward-looking Siemens IT landscape supported by the right tools. - You will contribute to innovative digital advancements in Siemens’ tax function for VAT/GST by developing and implementing concepts in collaboration with your team, always considering cross-country requirements. - You will participate in projects and act as an interface between departments, including supporting the ongoing development of existing solutions. Your defining qualities - Education- Completed bachelor's studies in economics, law with a focus on taxation, or a comparable field. - Certified tax advisor or equivalent qualification - Experience & Skills- At least five years of professional experience in indirect taxation, with a focus on VAT (consulting, projects, compliance, processes, and digitalization)- In-depth knowledge of global indirect tax requirements for implementing tax determination solutions- Strong foundation in IT and solid understanding of SAP FI, SD, and MM processes- Extensive experience with automated tax determination solutions (e.g., Vertex) and solid knowledge of software for indirect tax compliance and reporting- Very good knowledge of tax authority structures and workflows in key Siemens countries and at the EU level- Project management experience, ideally with exposure to digitalization or digital business models- Familiarity with waterfall and agile methodologies - Wasy of working: - Structured and analytical approach combined with a high level of initiative- Ability to manage complex projects and collaborate across functions and cultures - Languages- Your strong communication skills enable you to negotiate confidently in both German and English. You are much more than your qualifications, and we believe in the potential of every single candidate. We look forward to getting to know you! Your individual personality and perspective are important to us. We create a working environment that reflects the diversity of the society and support you in your personal and professional development. Let’s get to know your authentic personality and create a better future together with us. As an equal-opportunity employer ( https://www.siemens.com/de/de/unternehmen/jobs/arbeiten-bei-siemens/inklusion.html )  we are happy to consider applications from individuals with disabilities. About us We are responsible for the global implementation of digitalization within the Siemens Global Business Services Tax department. In doing so, we draw on proven methods as well as new technologies. We are in constant, trusted exchange with our colleagues from Tax, Siemens IT, and external providers to ensure "best of breed" solutions for a future-oriented and technologically secure digitalization of our global tax function. We closely monitor regulatory changes and analyze their impact on the current and future landscape. In this context, we act in alignment with the Siemens IT strategy and its transformation in the coming years. www.siemens.de/careers ( http://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs.html )  – if you would like to find out more about jobs & careers at Siemens. FAQ ( http://www.siemens.com/de/de/unternehmen/jobs/karrieren-entdecken.html )  – if you need further information on the application process.

CONTEXTE ET DEFINITION DU POSTE : Premier producteur indépendant français de carottes, issu d'une longue lignée d'agriculteurs, Planète Végétal est situé en Gironde au cœur du Parc Naturel Régional des Landes de Gascogne (entre Bordeaux et le Bassin d'Arcachon). Nous cultivons également des carottes dans la Vallée du Tage au Portugal. Nous recherchons une personnalité issue du monde agricole, disposant d'une expérience significative dans la gestion d'une exploitation et aimant travailler sur le terrain dans une interface entre la production agricole et la direction. Vous avez de bonnes connaissances agronomiques et une sensibilité aux conditions climatiques pour anticiper les travaux dans une structure à forte activité saisonnière. Vous êtes capable de vous investir dans les différents projets avec loyauté, persévérance et de faire vivre votre fonction en vous impliquant dans les missions suivantes : 1 - Suivi des cultures (70 à 100 ha) Suivi de toutes les cultures depuis l'implantation jusqu'à la récolte Elaboration des plannings de semis carottes et de plantation poireaux Diagnostic des maladies et ravageurs Elaboration des plannings d'intervention Evaluation de l'efficacité des interventions Gestion de la traçabilité et application des normes avec la pérennisation de la certification Globalgap Achat des intrants et gestion des stocks 2 - Organisation et Management (équipe de 3 personnes + saisonniers) Gestion du parc matériel (entretien, réparations, conduite du matériel, irrigation.) Gestion du personnel (recrutement, suivi administratif, management...) Gestion de la logistique aval avec le transporteur Gestion des fournisseurs 3 - Gestion des coûts Elaboration et suivi du budget Gestion de la trésorerie, des règlements fournisseurs en lien avec la Direction financière Suivi, contrôle et validation des factures Optimisation des coûts Liens étroits avec l'expert-comptable 4 - Gestion des informations Assurer la traçabilité du suivi des cultures Réaliser la traçabilité des interventions Effectuer un reporting journalier/ hebdomadaire auprès de la Direction Etre force de proposition pour optimiser l'activité 5 - Participation active aux différents travaux et opérations de production suivant les besoins pour répondre aux impératifs et tenir compte des exigences en vigueur PROFIL RECHERCHE : De formation agricole supérieure (Bac+2 à +5) avec une expérience minimum de 5 à 10 ans dans la gestion d'une exploitation, vous partagez les valeurs du travail et du respect de la terre. Vous avez une forte capacité de travail et disposez d'un très bon relationnel. Vous êtes honnête et faites preuve de rigueur. Vous êtes organisé(e) et doté(e) d'un esprit d'analyse, de synthèse. Vous maîtrisez les outils en bureautique et connaissez les nouvelles technologies en agriculture (GPS, sondes, capteurs, automate etc...). Vous parlez un portugais opérationnel. Poste basé à SALVATERRA DE MAGOS au PORTUGAL

Experience the power of a game-changing career Are you looking for what’s next? We’re a global technology and services leader that powers the brands of the future. We help well-known brands — the ones you use every day — improve their businesses with technology and integrated solutions, in over 70 countries. O nosso segmento de Operação & Manutenção está a recrutar um Técnico de O&M, que terá como principais responsabilidades: Cumprimento dos KPI's definidos contratualmente com clientes e interfaces correspondentes; Análise e solução de problemas técnicos que ocorrem numa instalação fotovoltaica; Cumprimento de todos os procedimentos e diretrizes da empresa; Interpretar desenhos e diagramas elétricos; Realizar serviços de manutenção de componentes elétricos; Diagnóstico de falhas resolução de problemas; Relatórios de manutenção; Executar relatórios de acompanhamento de atividades de operação e manutenção; Cumprimento do plano de Manutenção Preventiva designado para todos os equipamentos; Operação e resolução de todas as avarias existentes; Atender e dar suporte a emergências nas plantas fotovoltaicas da sua área ou quaisquer outras geografias onde a Voltalia gira plantas fotovoltaicas; Participar em atividades integradas de comissionamento e start-up em quaisquer outras geografias onde a Voltalia gira plantas fotovoltaicas. Competências-chave: Orientação para o cliente/Qualidade do serviço; Responsabilidade; Precisão/Rigor; Abertura à mudança; Mobilidade.

Responsabilidades e tarefas (incluem, mas não se limitam a): - Montagem e desmontagem de componentes e subconjuntos metálicos - Inspeção visual e dimensional de peças metálicas, de acordo com especificações técnicas - Reparação manual e técnica de componentes (preparação de superfícies, ajuste, polimento, maquinagem leve) - Preparação de lotes de trabalho e planeamento de processos técnicos - Execução de procedimentos de limpeza, preparação e tratamento de peças metálicas - Identificação de necessidades adicionais de reparação ou investigação técnica - Estruturar, planear e agendar processos técnicos complexos - Trabalho em equipa para resolução de desafios técnicos e otimização do fluxo de trabalho - Registo e documentação do trabalho realizado através de software relevante Ihr Profil: Estamos a recrutar um Técnico Industrial Metalomecânico para integrar a nossa equipa. Requisitos obrigatórios: - Formação profissional numa área metalomecânica, como: mecânico industrial, mecânico automóvel ou similar - Bons conhecimentos de português e inglês, obrigatórios (falado e escrito) - Capacidade comprovada para utilizar instrumentos de medição (paquímetros, micrómetros, comparadores, etc.) - Capacidade para planear, estruturar e organizar processos técnicos complexos - Direito legal de viver e trabalhar em Portugal Requisitos valorizados: - Experiência na indústria aeronáutica ou em ambiente de manutenção industrial - Experiência prévia em inspeção ou controlo dimensional de componentes - Certificações adicionais (NDT, CNC, Qualidade, Part-147, OEM) Por favor, envie a sua candidatura em inglês. As candidaturas serão avaliadas exclusivamente com base no mérito e competências demonstradas.

job_title: Electrician (f/m/d) - Electrician (m/f/d), Brasov (Industrial Electrician - Devices and Systems)
full_description: Oameni si tehnologie - Menschen und Technik Înfiintata în 2004 la Brasov, Automation Elektro Kreutzpointner-AER S.R.L. (AER) ofera solutii complete în domeniile electrotehnicii, automatizarii si IT-ului. Parte a grupului de firme Kreutzpointner, AER combina preturi competitive pe piata româneasca cu standarde de calitate germane, acoperind toate etapele unui proiect - de la planificare pâna la mentenanta. Gama noastra de servicii este utilizata în industrie, constructia de instalatii si infrastructura publica - atât în România, cât si la nivel european.   Cauti o provocare profesionala interesanta, în care sa-ti poti valorifica si dezvolta abilitatile? Atunci esti exact unde trebuie! Indiferent daca esti la început de drum, în cautarea unei noi perspective sau doresti sa-ti duci cariera la urmatorul nivel - îti oferim un loc de munca sigur si plin de oportunitati. La noi, în centrul atentiei nu sunt doar proiectele, ci mai ales oamenii. Ideile tale si implicarea ta sunt binevenite.   Die 2004 in Brasov gegründete Automation Elektro Kreutzpointner-AER S.R.L. (AER) bietet umfassende Lösungen in Elektrotechnik, Automation und IT. Als Teil der Kreutzpointner Unternehmensgruppe verbindet AER marktgerechte Preise in Rumänien mit deutschem Qualitätsanspruch und deckt von Planung bis Instandhaltung alle Projektphasen ab. Das Leistungsspektrum findet Anwendung in der Industrie, im Anlagenbau und in der kommunalen Infrastruktur - sowohl in Rumänien als auch europaweit.   Du suchst eine spannende berufliche Herausforderung, bei der du deine Fähigkeiten einbringen und weiterentwickeln kannst? Dann bist du bei uns genau richtig! Egal, ob du gerade ins Berufsleben startest, eine neue Perspektive suchst oder deine Karriere auf das nächste Level bringen möchtest - wir bieten dir einen Arbeitsplatz, der nicht nur sicher, sondern auch voller Chancen ist. Bei uns stehen nicht nur die Projekte, sondern vor allem die Menschen im Mittelpunkt. Deine Ideen und dein Engagement sind bei uns willkommen. job_title: Site Manager (m/f/d) - Construction Manager (m/w/d), Brasov (Construction Manager)
full_description: Oameni si tehnologie - Menschen und Technik Înfiintata în 2004 la Brasov, Automation Elektro Kreutzpointner-AER S.R.L. (AER) ofera solutii complete în domeniile electrotehnicii, automatizarii si IT-ului. Parte a grupului de firme Kreutzpointner, AER combina preturi competitive pe piata româneasca cu standarde de calitate germane, acoperind toate etapele unui proiect - de la planificare pâna la mentenanta. Gama noastra de servicii este utilizata în industrie, constructia de instalatii si infrastructura publica - atât în România, cât si la nivel european.   Cauti o provocare profesionala interesanta, în care sa-ti poti valorifica si dezvolta abilitatile? Atunci esti exact unde trebuie! Indiferent daca esti la început de drum, în cautarea unei noi perspective sau doresti sa-ti duci cariera la urmatorul nivel - îti oferim un loc de munca sigur si plin de oportunitati. La noi, în centrul atentiei nu sunt doar proiectele, ci mai ales oamenii. Ideile tale si implicarea ta sunt binevenite.   Die 2004 in Brasov gegründete Automation Elektro Kreutzpointner-AER S.R.L.
